Text:
the "Mike Matei"?
you mean the "Mike Matei" the friend of Angry Video Game Nerd made this book and has work with Disney, Marvel Comics, Hasbro Toys, ABC, Microsoft, Electronic Arts, Dreamworks and Nickelodeon?
you shitting me right?
I don't know he was an awesome guy!!!
fuck... I just read it wrong. it's not Mike Matei... it's Mike Mattesi. sorry for the awkwardness.
